page.title: Towing & Recovery
page.content:
Towing & Recovery

dp WinchÂ® has been a leader in commercial and military towing and recovery for almost 50 years. Our field-proven recovery products have stood the test of time and we continue to improve our design processes to offer the highest quality and most reliable products in the field.

CONTACT US

[ps2id id=’application-infrastructure’ target=’application-infrastructure’/]Light duty

Leveraging our expertise in the Heavy Duty towing and recovery market we are now pleased to announce that we are taking that technology to the light duty and car carrier market. We now offer a range of light recovery winches that incorporate the same technology, such as our proven balanced piston brake design, effective manual and pneumatic kickouts, and smooth cable drums ready for wire or synthetic rope. All while being a drop-in replacement for nearly all OEM winches.

More Information

Light duty

Leveraging our expertise in the Heavy Duty towing and recovery market we are now pleased to announce that we are taking that technology to the light duty and car carrier market. We now offer a range of light recovery winches that incorporate the same technology, such as our proven balanced piston brake design, effective manual and pneumatic kickouts, and smooth cable drums ready for wire or synthetic rope. All while being a drop-in replacement for nearly all OEM winches.

More Information

[ps2id id=’application-infrastructure’ target=’application-infrastructure’/]Heavy Duty

Whether theyâre called on for commercial or military-related recovery tasks, dp Winch products are engineered for a wide range of uses, including vehicle and equipment recovery, towing, and transport. From 60,000 lbs. capacity planetary winches to planetary gear drives for rotators, dp WinchÂ® offers tough, reliable solutions that meet the challenge.

Recovery applications

Everyday heroics

Since each situation is unique, recovery vehicles need reliable equipment thatâs ready for whatever comes their way, including harsh weather, challenging environments, and ultra-heavy payloads. Thatâs why dp WinchÂ®âs state-of-the-art recovery solutions are relentless, giving operators the edge, even in dangerous working conditions.
